thread.title: Ground News - Mamata slams BJP for mixing religion and politics
thread.title_full: Ground News - Mamata slams BJP for mixing religion and politics

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Mamata slams BJP for mixing religion and politics
text:
Summary by Ground News Ms. Banerjee remained non-committal on the question whether she will participate in the inauguration of the temple or not. Sources in the Trinamool Congress have, however, said the Chief Minister might give the event a miss. Accused the BJP of playing the card of religion before every election. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
The Hindu Lean Left High Factuality Independent: The Hindu Group Mamata slams BJP for mixing religion and politics Amid speculation whether she will participate in the inauguration of Ram mandir in Ayodhya, West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee on Thursday came down heavily on the BJP for mixing religion and politics.
2 hours ago · India Read Full Article
